__e: I would never lie to you about that.

And she's been lying about it this whole time.
I mean, I lied to her about everything.
They lied to us the whole time about everything. What?
You want to know why I lied to you about all of it?
Yeah, but my mom lied about where she was.
I never lie about what he did to me.
Just like you know we've been lying all this time about where we were and what happened to us there.
I lied to you, and I'm sorry for that.
Why would you lie to me and tell me he was dead?
So why did you lie and tell me that you weren't a goblin?
I just really thought I was doing the right thing, but I lied to you and I shouldn't have!
And so I lied, and it wasn't fair.
She lied to me and didn't tell me I had a son.
And that is why I lied and told the cops you were with me the entire night.
I just didn't tell you everything.
I mean... said that I lied to her and that I was just like the others.
Then why did you lie to us about your relationship?
If he is, he doesn't know that we know he lied about his location.
Is there a single person in my daughter's life that hasn't lied to me?
I know I lied about my family, but everything else I said is true.
And I don't know why I lied to you guys about having read that book.
She lied that your son was potentially not yours.
He lied to me... about being there.
I don't get it. - Why would you lie about your name ?
He is not having an affair, but he's lying to you about his job.
Yeah, but I didn't lie about why I was there.
You lied about why we came here and you lied about why you went up alone.
He lied to me... about being there.

If you're telling me the truth now doesn't that mean you've been lying to me for years?
The problem is everybody thinks he's something he's not.
Then why lie to us for so long?
Yeah. Except you were lying to me the whole time.
No,y-you lied to me the whole time!
No,y-you lied to me the whole time!

Yeah. Except you were lying to me the whole time.

No, they lied to me, you lied to me.
How you've been lying to me for years.
How she lied to me and everybody else.
The things you made me do, I lied to everyone.
I did something that day that I'd never done in my life. I didn't tell your mother the truth.
I didn't lie to anybody about who I was. - I didn't hurt anyone because of it.
